#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
  vector<string> guests;
  string temp;
  int i,n,count=0,j,max=0;
  cin>>n;
  for(i=0;i<n;i++)
  {
    cin>>temp;
    guests.push_back(temp);
  }
  sort(guests.begin(),guests.end());
  for(i=0;i<guests.size()-1;i++)
  {
    count=0;
    for(j=0;j<guests[i].size() && j<guests[i+1].size() && guests[i][j]==guests[i+1][j];j++)
    {
      count++;
    }
    if(count>max)
      max=count;      
  }
  cout<<"\n"<<max;
}
